name: Emerald Orb
description: A catalyst carved out of the hard jade from Jueyun Karst north of Liyue. Small, light, and durable, it is known more colloquially as the "jade ball."
descriptionRaw: A catalyst carved out of the hard jade from Jueyun Karst north of Liyue. Small, light, and durable, it is known more colloquially as the "jade ball."
story:
A lightweight catalyst carved out of emerald-green jade. It is durable and affordable, which makes it a popular item all around.
Small but exquisitely made, it is colloquially referred to by the people of Liyue as the "jade ball."
It is a highly efficient defensive Catalyst as well as a good-looking accessory.
effectTemplateRaw: Upon causing a Vaporize, Electro-Charged, Frozen, Bloom, or a Hydro-infused Swirl reaction, increases ATK by <color=#99FFFFFF>{0}</color> for 12s.
